name: Village Champion
description: You stood for your people against corruption, beasts, or tyranny. Ordinary folk still look to you as a symbol of hope.

feature.name: Folk Hero
feature.description: Common people will shelter and aid you. You can find a place to hide, rest, or recuperate among commoners, unless you have shown yourself to be a danger to them.

traits.text: I brag about my deeds, even small ones.
I always help those in need.
I am fiercely protective of the innocent.
I never back down from a challenge.
I remember every face from my village.

ideals.text: Protection. The strong must defend the weak.
Freedom. No one should live under tyranny.
Destiny. I was born for great things.
Glory. My name will be remembered.

bonds.text: I fight for someone I lost.
I carry a token from someone I saved.
I protect a secret that could harm my people.
A mentor taught me everything I know.

flaws.text: I cannot resist a damsel in distress.
I make enemies of the powerful.
I rush into danger without thinking.
I am haunted by a failure to protect someone.
I believe my own legend too much.
